mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.description AS "description", a.weight AS "weight", a.term_id AS "term.id", gt.name AS "term.name", a.item_id AS "item.id", i.name AS "item.name", a.script AS "script", a.script_desc AS "scriptDesc", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN diy_guide_term gt ON gt.id = a.term_id LEFT JOIN ope_item i ON i.id = a.item_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO int_guide_term_item( id, description, weight, term_id, item_id, script, script_desc, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{description}, #{weight}, #{term.id}, #{item.id}, #{script}, #{scriptDesc}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE int_guide_term_item SET description = #{description}, weight = #{weight}, term_id = #{term.id}, item_id = #{item.id}, script = #{script}, script_desc = #{scriptDesc}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
